data.text:
@bergerbell On one hand I'm overjoyed that the restriction mindset has fallen out of favor.

On the other hand, I'm astonished by how meekly most people accepted the restrictions, and how a totalitarian measure like banning people from going out at night lasted more than six months.

text:
@bergerbell On one hand I'm overjoyed that the restriction mindset has fallen out of favor.

On the other hand, I'm astonished by how meekly most people accepted the restrictions, and how a totalitarian measure like banning people from going out at night lasted more than six months.

@bergerbell I don't think they will have much trouble pivoting. They are the ones *creating* realities. And they have the media etc behind them, who are all in the same boat with them.

So they can just pivot without reflection, without shame, without meaningful demands for accountability.

1 out of 181,000 people are killed by lightning per year. 

Chance of death from lightning: 0.00055%
